A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie has no substance. It is just a reshuffling of previously used cool looking scenes without any logic. Characters are unappealing (with the exception of Luke) and are mostly just a collection of obligatory racially diverse plastic toys. There is no mythic quality\, no soul in the movie. Characters act nonsensically\, it is really a pain to watch it. And the violet-haired woman is unbearable.
